SEARCH
Module application.photos
Package application.photos.model

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
application.photos.model.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
this class represents a Photo. It contains the image File, its caption, the tags it has and the albums it is part of.
Author:
Jayman Rana

    • searchTagName

      public boolean searchTagName(String name)
      Searches a tag based on its name property.
      Parameters:
      name - String value to search for
      Returns:
      true if a Tag with the same name is found, otherwise returns false.

    • getCaption

      public String getCaption()
      Returns:
      caption of the Photo in String form.

    • printTags

      public String printTags()
      Builds a String based on all the Tags the Photo contains and appends all its values together.
      Returns:
      A String with all the Tag name : value seperated by commas.

    • containsPropertiesOf

      public boolean containsPropertiesOf(Tag tag)
      Searches the TagList of this Photo instance based on its properties.
      Parameters:
      tag - Tag instance that contains the properties to search for.
      Returns:
      true if a Tag contains the same properties, false if not found.
